content: this will quickly become your favorite basic mitten pattern - and knit in manos del uruguay s maxima it s a soft and squishy masterpiece finished sizes circumference around palm 7 5 materials manos del uruguay maxima 100g approx 218yds 100% merino wool 1 skip shown in m7158 mixed berries us 8/5mm double-pointed needles or size to obtain gauge us 6/4mm double-pointed needles or size to obtain gauge 1 stitch marker stitch holder gauge 19 sts and 27 row = 4 /10cm over st st with larger needles
